vital safety regulations, we need the airline industry to come to the table to ensure we have the greatest possible protections for airplane passengers,'' said Charles Ellis Schumer , who was releasing letters to the FAA on Sunday. The airline industry needs to recognize that the safer passengers feel, the more likely they will be to fly. Greater safety standards benefit the industry and most importantly, benefits the American public. The Air Transport Association did not immediately comment. U.S. Sen. Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said.`` It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body.''
